name: teleportation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of travelling by an imaginary very fast form of transport that uses special technology or special mental powers, or of causing someone or something to travel in this way: Teleportation is probably among the more viable of science fiction's wild dreams. Most people think of teleportation as the means by which Scotty beamed up Captain Kirk in Star Trek.
More examplesFewer examplesIs a parking-free city a pipe dream, achievable only when we perfect Star Trek-type travel by teleportation?Do not expect to see teleportation in your lifetime.In the movie a love-struck scientist is transformed into a monstrous man/fly hybrid after the teleportation device he has invented goes horribly wrong.Teleportation is already possible at a quantum level, scientists having successfully transported the information about an atom across a lab instantaneously.
